subject: JUnitCore.runClasses and @RunWith
msgSnippet: Hi, I always assumed that JUnitCore.runClasses(...) could also run classes annotated with @RunWith. Was this assumption wrong? It does not seem to work with
messageBody:
Hi,

I always assumed that JUnitCore.runClasses(...) could also run classes annotated with @RunWith. Was this assumption wrong? It does not seem to work with ClasspathSuite nor with Suite (tested with JUnit 4.6). At least, I don't see any console output. Should I?

confused...

Johannes
